title: Self-Editing Indie Manuscripts: A Basic Self-Editing Guide for Indie Authors
description: Learn to use these editing steps to improve your indie fiction writing!EDIT 1: FULL READ EDITEDIT 2. SPELL CHECK EDITEDIT 3: GRAMMAR EDITEDIT 4: RECHECK EDITEDIT 5: LISTEN EDITEDIT 6: CONDITIONAL EDITEDIT 7: PDF EDITEDIT 8: PRINT EDITEDIT 9: FORMAT EDITSEMI-FINAL EDITFINAL EDITThese editing steps will get a manuscript as close to a professionally edited manuscript as possible without spending large amounts of money.This guide assumes the author has Microsoft Word installed on a PC or laptop.
author: Linda Pogue
